text: The Authority, its members, and its employees may not be liable for any obligation of or claim against the Authority or its members or employees or the District of Columbia resulting from actions taken to carry out this Act.
historical:
Prior Codifications

1981 Ed., § 47-391.4.

References in Text

"This Act," referred to in this section, is the District of Columbia Financial Responsibility and Management Assistance Act of 1995, approved April 17, 1995, 109 Stat. 97, Pub. L. 104-8.

DC CODE § 47-391.04

Current through December 11, 2012

title.text: Taxation, Licensing, Permits, Assessments, and Fees. (Refs & Annos)

chapter.text: Budget and Financial Management; Borrowing; Deposit of Funds.

part.text: Establishment and Organization of Authority. (Refs & Annos)

heading.catch_text: Exemption from liability for claims for authority employees.
